subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm Pt
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

EXPLOSIVE BRANGELINA FAMILY SECRETS!
Showbiz Tonight uncovers the never-before-heard details of
Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's personal life. You will hear
Angelina in her own words talk about being a mom, spending
time
with Brad and the kids, even how they make their sex
life work!


STARS AND PLASTIC SURGERY!
Showbiz Tonight investigates star plastic surgery successes
and
nightmares. We reveal whose nips and tucks were
terrific and
whose were just plain terrible. The good, the
bad, and the
sometimes very ugly side of plastic surgery!

SHOULD SMOKING BE BANNED IN MOVIES?
The
movie industry will now start taking into account smoking
in movies when determining ratings. If there is too much
smoking that can't be justified by the plot, the movie will
get
an "R" rating. Is this a good idea or are the p.c.
police going
too far? The heated debate on TV's most
provocative
entertainment news show.

SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY
Smoking on-screen: Should
smoking be banned in movies?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT

THIS WEEKEND ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

SATURDAY 5/12/07 - When stars get hurt by their
own
words. Why do some of Hollywood's biggest stars say the
outrageous, embarrassing, and destructive things they do?
And
what's the secret to overcoming foot-in-mouth disease?
Hear
them in their own words!

SUNDAY
5/13/07
    Is Lindsay Lohan in serious trouble? Why
her on-screen
career could be on the line and is her
personal life getting in
the way of her professional life?

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL
Send your response to
the Question Of The Day on video. Look
into your camera and
tell us what you think. Responses must be
no longer than 30
seconds. To send your video email, go to
cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses on
"Showbiz
Tonight" at 
11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline
Prime.
